name: INK v2
author: QooQee.com
description:
𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗱 & 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗰𝗲
Ink provides a powerful find-and-replace tool that works on all text elements including those in groups and masked groups.

𝗙𝗼𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝗶𝘇𝗲
Ink allows you to uniquely change the font-size of all the selected elements.


More XD plugins at 𝗤𝗼𝗼𝗤𝗲𝗲.𝗰𝗼𝗺/𝘅𝗱
releaseNotes:
Working with groups
Find and replace now works within the groups in any depth (if you have a group within a group within...).

Faster processing
Works better with large files for finding and replace.

Pushing enhanced
Pushing applies to more scenarios where the push is necessary
